content: Love the game!
Great for keeping my brain sharp. I really enjoy this app!
I am glad that I purchased this paid version because it works more smoothly than the free version.

This new version, perhaps in conjunction with my new phone, is way faster than the old version. My scores are suddenly higher. I hope that doesn't mean the game has suddenly been made easier, as the hard mode used is the same. I think the game just works more quickly, and saves time. Overall, this new version is a great improvement. Indeed, it would have been nice if I had gotten some notice of the revision while using the old one obliviously.üòâ
Best word game in the Play Store.
Resume Auto save is not working since last update.

Could not dl at first. Sent email to dev and was answered almost immediately. He offered my money back right off. Very nice person. Fortunately a few days later it dl'd just fine. Love the game! It's very entertaining and, though easy to play, it is still challenging. So, great game, great dev. Definitely worth the price!
Not as fun as the original
Now a MUCH better app than the old dropwords, also LOVE that i can have both paid and free versions on same phone üòÉ
Best word game app, great developer, turns out I can have both the premium and the free in one phone, thereby allowing me to double the accomplishments challenge!
Have the original version of this game, but VII is better!

Played dropwords all the time on my phone. It was great, but it often overheated my phone. So, installed version II, after reading reviews and seeing improvements have been made.  Well, it's rare I get through a game without a freeze and the game has now crashed my phone 3 times.  Unfortunately, like a dope, I bought the game before trying the free version. Don't be like me. Try it first.

This is one of the best 'Word Creator' titles, available. After, playing this game's demo. (approx. 3 months time), i've always played the demo, at least one round, 3 times/day. This title, not only keeps players thinking but word recognition from memory, is what truly keeps those, intrigue...that and instantly, pure addiction! Great title (summarized)! üòâ
Love it, we'll done! üíùüëç
Finally a developer who cares

Lots of fun. My only request would be that the developer get it working with the Note 4 stylus... EDIT: Thanks for looking into the issue Ben. You've made a really great game here. Hopefully the stylus issue might be solved some day.
replyContent: Hi Craig, I'm glad you're enjoying the game. What's the stylus bug you mention? Presumably it's not stopping you play, but if you can send me details I'll investigate (although I don't have a Note 4 to test on!): bengarrett1971@googlemail.com.  - Ben

content: Addictive!!! Love this game.
More fun than naked wrestling and cheaper yippeeeee.
Bye, lag! Performance improvements for the win. This game is addictive, it's fun to play any day, any time.

The larger board size is a welcome addition over the original Dropwords, and it runs as smooth as ever.  I would like to maybe see a coloured point indicator when you make a word in the Casino theme, because the white number is hard to see against the letter tiles.   Maybe make it flash like a neon casino sign...? A small detail though, I do love this game!  Love it love it!
Love it
